reviews.customers_say: Customers find the vest cute and trendy, with great quality and a perfect fit. The material is soft and comfortable, though opinions about its thickness are mixed, with some finding it nice while others note it's thick but thin at the same time. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some saying it runs small. The vest's durability receives mixed feedback, with one customer noting it holds up well after washing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
items.body: Super cute and thicker fabric than I expected. Woerjed great for my maternity shoot. Can size down for a more slimming look Read more
items.author: CecilMay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do recommend
items.body: Bought this because a girl I follow on instagram bought it and it looked super cute, but I didn’t have high hopes because I feel like most clothes I’ve got on Amazon are trash but it’s surprisingly made really well and looks super cute! The material is very soft and nice too! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Casual
items.body: Wore this tie-front top in Nashville and got so many compliments! Super cute, comfy, and perfect with jeans or a skirt. It held up all night—through rooftop bars, dancing, and hot chicken. 10/10 Nashville-approved!” Read more
items.author: Dani’s Everyday Finds

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware off buttons
items.body: Good fit. Buttons do come undone a little bit sometimes. Comfortable and love how it looks! Read more
items.author: Colleen Pearson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy fit
items.body: Soooo cute, but runs a little small. Just gives me more incentive to lose a couple more pounds. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just didn’t fit right
items.body: I really wanted to love this, and I did hold onto it for a few days before I did return it. It was so soft, and the color was perfect, and it did seem of good quality, but it just didn’t fit right. I’m 5’1”, around 145lbs, and I ordered a medium, but I should’ve tried the small. It was bigger around the armpit/shoulder area, and since I am shorter, the ties landed awkwardly. Looking at the model photo, where that bottom tie lands, lower than about 5 inches on where it landed on me, almost to the crotch. Read more
items.author: Regan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute tie front vest. Fair price.
items.body: Cute blue tie front vest. Washed well in washing machine. Will wear over a short sleeve black shirt for work. Read more
items.author: Shannon

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Heart Pink, Red, Pink, White, Purple, Yellow, Christmas Red, Heart Red a, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
